text: I ordered the pizza online. Went to pick it up was informed that there is a glitch in the system that sends orders to a different location. I asked if they could make the pizza was told that it would be just easier for everyone if I just …More

name: Creek Walker
text:
If you enjoy sitting in a freezing cold restaurant this is the place to be.
By the time I got to my 3rd piece of pizza it was ice cold.
My wife asked if they could raise the thermostat they said no.
When I paid the bill I told the manager that I would never come back.

name: Micah Adamson
text: We ordered 8 pizzas online for my job on Labor Day due to us getting busy and people not being able to take a lunch. I placed the order at 10:15 to pick up at 11:45. Paid for it online. I was greeted with please give us 24 hours notice next …More

text: I've had good experiences with the staff as well as the food prepared by them.

name: Tomi Davis
text: Very friendly staff. Lunch buffet is ok. Take a jacket no matter how hot it is outside because you're going to freeze your buns off! Feels like thermostat is on 55. Even my hot-natured husband was chilled.

text: Met and seated promptly. Received drink. Ordered and waited over 20 minutes for Pasta. Finally my Pasta arrived with no Garlic Bread. Waitress apologized and I told her to just put it with my other, to go, order. About done eating and a different waitress brings my Garlic Bread! Pasta good, service not so good.

text: Clean and what you would expect from a Pizza Hut. My only reservation is that the staff wasn’t exactly responsive. To be clear, they were not actively rude, but it was clear that no one was going to go out of their way to be helpful. However, it’s Pizza Hut, not the Polo Lounge.
